greeting.message: Hello and welcome to the Public Grievance Redressal Portal! We're here to assist you with any concerns or grievances you might have against government organizations across India. Our portal, empowered by advanced technologies, ensures your grievances are addressed promptly and efficiently. Here's how you can navigate our services:

cpgrams_intro.message: The Centralized Public Grievance Redress and Monitoring System (CPGRAMS) is an innovative platform designed to facilitate the filing and tracking of grievances. It leverages the latest in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to streamline the grievance redressal process, ensuring your concerns are addressed effectively and efficiently. Here's how you can get started:

registration_process.message: Here's how you can register on CPGRAMS...

filing_grievance.message: I'll fill a grievance on your behalf. Briefly describe your grievance.

tracking_grievance.message: Please enter your grievance registration number to track its status.

faqs.message: You are now in FAQ mode. Ask me anything! Type `quit FAQ` to return to the main menu.

anything_else.message: Is there anything else I can help you with?

grievance_category.message: Please select the category of your grievance.

yes.message: Thank you! Your grievance has been submitted.
